gallery_slide.gallery_image_credit: © Sunset Publishing/Photo by Thomas J. Story
gallery_slide.gallery_image_caption: The magazine's travel stories often focus on enjoying the outdoors, as in a recent cover story on camping, photographed by staff photographer Thomas J. Story.
A story on Tijuana, photographed by Dave Lauridsen, combines two areas of focus for the magazine: Food, and travel excursions that can be enjoyed in a weekend.

gallery_slide.gallery_image_credit: © Sunset Publishing/Photo by Brown Cannon III
gallery_slide.gallery_image_caption: A story on the wolves of Yellowstone National Park, photographed by Brown Cannon III.
